content:
/>
VIII.iv.2.C.1.b
.
Contacting Compensation Service
Contact Compensation Service, Policy Staff (211), at
VAVBAWAS/CO/214DADVISORYANDSRT
for guidance, if the response to the request for FPOW service records
indicates that no records may be released because they are classified, or
is inadequate.
References
:  For more information on
requesting guidance from Compensation Service, see
M21-1, Part X Subpart v, 1.A
, and
submitting an FPOW determination for approval, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 2.A.3.b
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C - Development and Examination Request for Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C
